_header: Heaven is wonnen with woe and shame
_description: How to win Heaven or Hell — two couplets

BLRoy17Bxvii.Transcription:
Heuen is wonnen with woo & shameHelle is wonnen with gle and
                    gameI aske þe þen of þese twooIn world were better haue
                    wele or woo
BLRoy17Bxvii.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             Yorkshire Writers.
         2 vols. London, Sonnenschein; New York: Macmillan, 1895-96: 2.64.
